genre: cyberpunk action, dark fantasy, revenge thriller
premise: In a neon-drenched Neo-Tokyo overrun by cyber-enhanced goblins, a cybernetically-augmented warrior seeks revenge for his murdered family while battling the darkness within himself

visual_style.aesthetic: hyperrealistic characters with cyberpunk enhancements, gritty neon-noir atmosphere

camera_angles: dutch angles for chaos and violence
cinematography.lighting: high contrast neon lighting, rim lighting on characters, volumetric fog and rain, cybernetic glow accents

districts: Neon District - entertainment and red light areas with heaviest goblin activity
Industrial Sprawl - factories and goblin nests
Upper City - corporate towers where wealthy hide from goblin threat
location.atmosphere: perpetual night, constant rain, neon-drenched streets, technological decay

technology_level.cybernetics: widespread human augmentation, military-grade combat implants, black market modifications
technology_level.weapons: smart guns, energy blades, hacking tools, EMP devices
technology_level.environment: holographic advertisements, flying vehicles, megastructures, automated systems

world_setting.socioeconomic: corporate-controlled society, wealth inequality, cybernetic enhancement divides classes
world_setting.supernatural_elements: cyber-goblins - fantasy creatures merged with stolen technology, corrupted by industrial pollution

narrative_structure.episode_format: serialized story with episodic goblin hunts
narrative_structure.pacing: fast-paced action with moments of quiet tension

story_arcs.description: Kai hunts the cyber-goblin warlord who killed his family
story_arcs.episodes: main serialized arc spanning entire series

story_arcs.description: Kai struggles with increasing cybernetic augmentation and losing his humanity
Kai's relationship with tech specialist Hiroshi Yamamoto
Uncovering the corporate conspiracy behind cyber-goblin creation

kai_nakamura.cybernetics: visible circuit patterns on face, glowing cyan cybernetic eye, mechanical joints at jawline
kai_nakamura.clothing: black tactical vest with glowing blue circuit patterns, military-inspired gear
kai_nakamura.color_scheme: black base with electric blue and cyan accents

character_design.general_principles: photorealistic anime faces with cybernetic enhancements, detailed mechanical parts, realistic proportions

environment_design.neo_tokyo: dense vertical city, neon signs in Japanese and English, holographic advertisements, rain-slicked streets
environment_design.goblin_nests: industrial decay merged with organic corruption, stolen tech integration, toxic waste aesthetics

action_choreography.combat_style: tactical and brutal, cybernetic-enhanced moves, weapon variety
action_choreography.camera_work: dynamic angles, motion blur for speed, slow-motion for impact moments
action_choreography.effects: energy weapon trails, blood spray, sparks from damaged cybernetics, holographic UI overlays

cyberpunk_aesthetics.neon_integration: every scene has neon light sources, color-coded for mood
cyberpunk_aesthetics.rain_usage: constant rain for atmosphere and neon reflections

goblin_design_guide.appearance: twisted fusion of fantasy goblin and scavenged cybernetics

variations.description: small, crude tech implants, rusty weapons, green skin with circuitry scars
military-grade stolen implants, larger build, organized pack tactics
heavily augmented, custom weapons, intelligent, glowing cybernetic enhancements

goblin_design_guide.behavior: savage but cunning, use stolen tech instinctively, pack hunters
